overview: Sheila, a paraplegic, accidentally witnesses murder across her house, from her bedroom window. The murderer sees Sheila so he crosses over to her house to kill her and her family. Laras, a reporter, and her partner, Aria, try to solve the mysterious killings. Laras, who has sixth sense, is helped by the spirit of the murdered Sheila.
title: Rahasia Bintang
